value.title: 3 steps to pin Reporting Services visuals to a Power BI Dashboard

There are three main steps you have to do to get this to work.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: 3 ways Reporting Services and Power BI work together

From the Power BI mobile app, to pinning visualizations to a dashboard and how Reporting Services handles Power BI Desktop files.  #PowerBI #SSRS  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: 5 Guy in a Cube tips to make BETTER VIDEO!
value.excerpt: Recording video is hard. So much goes into it that most people get frustrated or give up. We've learned a few things over the years.
